name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Purity Vision - NSFW AI Image Filter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter NSFW images from the impure web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that hides explicit images/videos. Purity Vision blurs out images that have nudity, gore,  and shock-content!

Note: Purity Vision requires payment to use, as it utilizes advanced Machine Learning and AI from Google's image recognition software. You only pay for what you use and cancel at anytime!

Reach out to me at: gradeycullins@gmail.com if you're interested in a free trial
